# Problem 5.54 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement
A square brass bar is placed between two fixed walls and heated from 5 °C to 35 °C. If L = 450 mm, h = 15 mm, E = 100 GPa, and α = 20 x 10<sup>-6</sup> /°C, determine the stress in the bar.
